comments:
Using build 0520.

Steps:
1) Open a project's Properties dialog
2) Select 'External 
Builders' page, doesn't display
3) Select another page, then go back, page shows up
4) Close 
dialog
5) Re-open dialog
5) Dialog doesn't appear, following log message 
generated:
